title: Is there anyway to save search results in IDA Pro?
content:
This might be a newbie question but it really takes too long to search for certain things in IDA, when I close the app and save the database all my searches are gone and that's just frustrating.
I'm aware that I can copy and paste them all in text file but I prefer saving them in IDA itself.

Any help will be much appreciated.

comments.text: You can use the Mark Position feature. (Jump -> Mark Position).

Hey @ExtremeCoders and thanks for the answer, but that's not even close to what i'm looking for, some searches contains hundreds of results and I have to check them manually but I won't be able to do that at once, so if I decided to close the app for any reason I won't be able to complete what I started.
Perhaps you can use a script for that.
